main event: A silvery-white object, slightly larger than a grapefruit, was observed in Fort Wayne, Indiana for approximately 4-5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially descending and then turned west before altering its course to the northeast., The object faded from view smoothly and was speculated to behave like an aircraft., The observer's visibility conditions were excellent with bright sunlight and no obstructions., No photographs were captured for this sighting., Military presence in the area could contribute to sightings of aircraft.
witness description: Mrs., Deputy Clerk, U.S. District Court
